components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}
components/category/sidebar:
{{#if category.subcategories}}
Categories
    {{#each category.subcategories}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}} {{> components/faceted-search/index category}} {{else}} {{> components/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}} {{/if}}
components/common/breadcrumbs:
{{#unless theme_settings.hide_breadcrumbs }} {{#each breadcrumbs}}
  • {{#or @last (if url "==" null)}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/or}}
    • {{/each}} {{/unless}}
components/category/product-listing:
<form action="{{urls.compare}}" method='POST' {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}} data-list-name="Category: {{category.name}}" {{/if}} data-product-compare>
    {{#if theme_settings.product_list_display_mode '===' 'grid'}}
        {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}}
            {{> components/products/grid products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings event="list" }}
        {{else}}
            {{> components/products/grid products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings}}
        {{/if}}
    {{else}}
        {{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}}
            {{> components/products/list products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings event="list" }}
        {{else}}
            {{> components/products/list products=category.products show_compare=category.show_compare theme_settings=theme_settings}}
        {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
</form>

{{> components/common/paginator pagination.category}}
layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

        <script>
            {{!-- Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css --}}
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        </script>
        {{!-- Load Lazysizes script ASAP so images will appear --}}
        <script>
            {{!-- Only load visible elements until the onload event fires, after which preload nearby elements. --}}
            window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {};
            window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;
        </script>
        <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js'}}"></script>
        <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn.rlets.com/capture_configs/b1b/757/ca8/cc54d43804c2de81bc18a03.js" async="async"></script>

        {{ getFontsCollection }}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
        <style type="text/css" media="screen, print">
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 100;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Thin.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Thin.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 400;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Regular.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Regular.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Bold.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Bold.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 800;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Extrabold.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Extrabold.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 900;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Black.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Black.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: italic;
            font-weight: 100;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Thin.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Thin.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: italic;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Light.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Light.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
            @font-face {
            font-family: 'ProximaNova';
            font-style: italic;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-display: swap;
            src: url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Bold.woff2'}}") format('woff2'),
                 url("{{cdn 'webdav:ProximaNova-Alt-Bold.woff'}}") format('woff');
            }
        </style>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.5.2/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-JcKb8q3iqJ61gNV9KGb8thSsNjpSL0n8PARn9HuZOnIxN0hoP+VmmDGMN5t9UJ0Z" crossorigin="anonymous">
        <script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/c2b0ed3023.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Thin.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Regular.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Bold.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Extrabold.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Black.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Alt-Thin.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Alt-Light.woff2" crossorigin>
    	<link rel="preload" as="font" type="font/woff2" href="https://store-tvpg77x4p0.mybigcommerce.com/content/ProximaNova-Alt-Bold.woff2" crossorigin>
    	
    	<style type="text/css">
        .white {
          color: #fff;
        }
        
        .black {
          color: #000;
        }
        
        .blue {
          color: #002E6D;
        }
        
        .red {
          color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .bg-black {
          background-color: #000;
        }
        
        .bg-white {
          background-color: #fff;
        }
        
        .bg-blue {
          background-color: #002E6D;
        }
        
        .bg-red {
          background-color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .bg-light-grey {
          background-color: #F9F9F9;
        }
        
        .bg-grey {
          background-color: #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .bd-grey {
          border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        body, p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
          color: #000;
        }
        
        body {
          font-family: "ProximaNova", sans-serif;
        }
        body p, body h1, body h2, body h3, body h4, body h5, body h6 {
          font-family: "ProximaNova", sans-serif;
        }
        
        body h1, body h2, body h3, body h4, body h5, body h6 {
          letter-spacing: 0;
        }
        body h1, body .h1 {
          font-size: 28px;
          font-weight: 900;
          line-height: 32px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h1, body .h1 {
            font-size: 54px;
            line-height: 66px;
          }
        }
        body h2, body .h2, body .facet-quick-heading {
          font-size: 22px;
          line-height: 26px;
          font-weight: 600;
          margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h2, body .h2, body .facet-quick-heading {
            font-size: 36px;
            line-height: 44px;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
          }
        }
        body h3, body .h3 {
          font-size: 20px;
          font-weight: 900;
          line-height: 32px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h3, body .h3 {
            font-size: 26px;
            line-height: 32px;
          }
        }
        body h4, body .h4 {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 700;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body h4, body .h4 {
            font-size: 18px;
          }
        }
        body h5, body .h5 {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: none;
        }
        body p {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 29px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          body p {
            font-size: 16px;
          }
        }
        
        .xl {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 28px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .xl {
            font-size: 22px;
            line-height: 32px;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
          }
        }
        
        .lg {
          font-size: 16px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 28px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .lg {
            font-size: 18px;
            line-height: 32px;
          }
        }
        
        .sm {
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 400;
          line-height: 20px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .sm {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 20px;
          }
        }
        
        .eleven {
          font-size: 11px;
        }
        
        a {
          color: #ED1C24;
        }
        
        .button--primary {
          border-radius: 27px;
          padding: 1.1rem 2.25rem;
          margin-bottom: 0;
          border: 0px solid transparent;
        }
        .button--primary:hover {
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        .button--blue {
            background-color: #002E6D;
        }
        .login-wrapper .button {
            width: 100%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 576px) {
          .login-wrapper .button {
            width: auto;
          }  
        }
        .button--large {
          font-size: 12px;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .button--large {
            font-size: 14px;
          }
        }
        
        .button-sm-radius {
          border-radius: 4px;
        }
        
        .button-full-width {
          width: 100%;
        }
        .button-login-to-order {
            font-size: 12px;
            padding: .75rem 1.25rem;
        }
        .button-login-to-order {
            border: 0px solid transparent;
        }
        .productView-options .button--primary {
          border-radius: 27px;
          width: 100%;
          font-weight: 700;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        .productView-options form[data-cart-item-add] {
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .form-wishlist .button {
          border-radius: 4px;
          width: 100%;
          color: #000;
        }
        
        .form-prefixPostfix .button {
          height: auto;
        }
        
        .form-input {
          height: 53.19px;
        }
        
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navPages .dropdown, .navPages .navPages-item {
            left: 0;
            position: relative;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action-moreIcon, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action-moreIcon {
            transform: rotate(-90deg);
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem 0.5rem;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-menu, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-menu {
            border: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
            min-width: fit-content;
            margin: 0;
            border-top-left-radius: 0;
            border-top-right-radius: 0;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item {
            color: #000;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 14px;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item:focus, .navPages .dropdown .dropdown-item:hover, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item:focus, .navPages .navPages-item .dropdown-item:hover {
            background-color: transparent;
            color: #ED1C24;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action:hover, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action:hover {
            color: #ED1C24;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action.activePage, .navPages .dropdown .navPages-action:focus, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action.activePage, .navPages .navPages-item .navPages-action:focus {
            color: #000;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem 1rem;
          }
          .navPages .navPages-item:first-child .nav-link {
            padding-left: 0;
          }
          .navPages .navPages-item:last-child .nav-link {
            padding-right: 0;
          }
        }
        
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navPages .show .navPages-action-moreIcon {
            transform: rotate(0);
          }
        }
        
        .dropdown-toggle::after {
          content: none;
        }
        
        .heroCarousel-content {
          background-color: #002E6D;
          margin: 0;
          text-align: left;
          width: 100%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .heroCarousel-content {
            background-color: transparent;
          }
        }
        
        .navUser {
          padding: 0;
        }
        
        .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
          text-transform: none;
          font-size: 14px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
            font-size: 12px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
            font-size: 13px;
          }
          .navPages .dropdown .nav-link, .navPages .navPages-item .nav-link {
            padding: 1.25rem .75rem;
          }
          .navUser-action {
            padding: 1rem .5rem;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .navUser-action {
            padding: 1rem .5rem;
          }
          .navUser-action, .navPages-action {
            font-size: 14px;
          }
        }
        .navUser-action:hover, .navPages-action:hover {
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        
        .navPages {
          margin: 0;
          text-align: left;
        }
        
        .container {
          padding-right: 15px;
          padding-left: 15px;
          padding-top: 0;
          padding-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .body {
          margin-top: 0;
          margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .d1-block {

        .b-black {

        }
        
        .reg {

        }
        
        .u {

        }
        
        .nb {
          list-style: none;

        }
        .nb li {
          line-height: 26px;
        }
        .nb a {
          font-weight: 300;
        }
        
        hr {
          border-top: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        hr.r-two {
          margin-top: 2rem;
          margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .border-radius {
          border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        ol, ul {
          margin-left: 20px;
        }
        
        .image-separator .img {
          height: 240px;
          background-repeat: no-repeat;
          background-position: center;
          background-size: cover;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 768px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 340px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 440px;
          }
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
          .image-separator .img {
            height: 540px;
          }
        }
        
        .branding .logo {
          position: relative;
          z-index: 20;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .branding .header-logo-image {
            margin: auto 0;
          }
        }
        .branding .form-input {
          border-radius: 22px;
          color: #000;
          border-color: #C8C8C8;
          font-size: 14px;
          height: auto;
        }
        .branding .form i {
          position: absolute;
          top: 16px;
          right: 30px;
          color: #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .header-logo--left .header-logo-image {
          right: 0;
        }
        
        .mobile-nav {
          border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
        }
        
        .header {
          border-bottom: 0px solid transparent;
          height: 55px;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .header {
            height: auto;
          }
        }
        .header .header-logo {
          text-align: center;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .header .header-logo {
            text-align: left;
          }
        }
        .header .header-logo > a {
          width: 70%;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 551px) {
          .header .header-logo > a {
            padding: 0.68rem 0;
          }
        }
        
        .nav-top {
          border-bottom: 0 solid transparent;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 801px) {
          .nav-top {
            border-top: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;
          }
        }
        .nav-top .navPages-container .navPages-list .navPages-action {

        .subscribe-form input[type=email]::placeholder {

          opacity: 1;
          text-transform: uppercase;
        }
        
        .arrow-send {
          position: relative;
          display: -webkit-box;
          display: -ms-flexbox;
          display: flex;
          -webkit-box-align: center;
          -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
          -webkit-box-pack: center;
          -ms-flex-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
          text-align: center;
          height: 45px;
          width: 45px;
          background: #000;
          border-radius: 4px;
          overflow: hidden;
          color: transparent;
          border: 0px solid transparent;
          transition: none;
        }
        .arrow-send:before {
          content: "";
          font-family: FontAwesome;
          color: #fff;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.4s ease;
          height: 15px;
          position: absolute;
          top: 12px;
          left: 15px;
          width: 15px;
        }
        .arrow-send:hover:before {
          left: 50px;
        }
        .arrow-send:after {
          content: "";
          font-family: FontAwesome;
          color: #fff;
          font-size: 14px;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.4s;
          height: 15px;
          position: absolute;
          top: 12px;
          right: 50px;
          width: 15px;
        }
        .arrow-send:hover:after {
          right: 15px;
        }
        
        .modal {
          left: 50%;
          height: auto;
        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
          .modal {
            width: 900px;
          }
        }

        }
        @media only screen and (min-width: 1200px) {

                max-height: 24.5rem;

        .card .form-increment .cart-button, .card .form-increment {
            display: none !important;
        }

{{!-- BundleB2B --}}
<script>
    const inPages = () => {
        const urlArray = [          
            '/buy-again/',
            '/address-book/',
            '/create-quote/',
            '/quote-detail/',
            '/quote/',
            '/quote-edit/',
            '/quote-list/',
            '/quotes-list/',
            '/dashboard/',
            '/order-detail/',
            '/quick-order-pad/',
            '/shopping-list/',
            '/shopping-lists/',
            '/user-management/',
            '/invoices/',
            '/invoice-payment/',
            '/invoice-details/',
            '/invoice-payment-receipt/',
            '/account.php',
        ];
        const current = window.location.pathname;
        return urlArray.includes(current);
    };
    if(!inPages()) {
        document.querySelector('.body').style.display = "block";
    }
    if(inPages()) {
        const style = document.createElement('style');
        style.innerHTML = `
            .navBar.navBar--sub.navBar--account {
                display: block !important;
            }
        `;
        document.querySelector('head').append(style);
    }
</script>

Back to Top

DDP Medical Supply offers wholesale medical supplies and equipment, sales and distribution in a reliable and timely fashion to durable medical equipment companies (DME), pharmaceutical retailers, physician offices and surgical centers.

DDP Medical equipment wholesale has been partnering with the medical community within the USA for over 20 years. Areas of expertise include wholesale diabetic supplies wholesale CGM, as well as being a medical surgical supplier, urology supplier and wound care supplier.
